title: Northern Lights Alert: Sun’s Activity At 23-Year High With Aurora This Weekend, Scientists Say
description: Naked-eye auroras are likely in northern-tier U.S. states this weekend  as a geomagnetic storm gets underway. It comes as the sun's activity is highest since 2001.
